ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "After picking my first fresh wild garlic, I had to find a way to use masses of wild garlic. This recipe is super quick and the color and taste will never make you want to use store-bought pesto again! Freezing it works nicely as well!"
ins: Pulse garlic, basil, avocado oil, and olive oil in a food processor until garlic and basil are roughly chopped. Add Parmesan cheese and pine nuts; process until a smooth paste forms. Season with salt and black pepper.
